name: greenly
content:
greenly adverb
(COLOUR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
with a green colour, for example because of being covered with grass, trees, or other plants: He gazed out at the greenly rippling fields. The jungle canopy glowed greenly in the tropical sun.
More examplesFewer examplesThe animals' eyes glittered greenly.

greenly adverb
(ENVIRONMENT)
in a way that does not damage the environment, or in a way that shows you care about the environment: The party aimed to tax more greenly, without hitting the poorest. Some of the people telling us how to live more greenly are real hypocrites.
